main module¶

main.data_from_json()¶

Calls a function that reads .json file with information about number of tweets in various countries

Returns

dict

main.day()¶

Gets a day of a week when there were the majority of tweets posted

Returns

str

main.get_countries()¶

Reads a file with all existing countries in the world

Returns

list

main.main_posts()¶

Returns a graphic ot draw

Returns

dash html

main.read_json()¶

Reads .json file with daily reports about tweets in different countries

Returns

dict

main.spearman()¶

Calls a function from another module that counts a Spearman correlation coefficient

Returns

float

main.update_figure(day_week_name)¶
main.update_graph(date)¶
